settings.heading: How To Use
settings.description:
Use all over body. Best applied liberally after showering when skin is still damp. Can be used on hair and nails to deep condition. Store in a cool, dark place.

Always test on a small patch of skin prior to use.

settings.heading: Ingredients
settings.description:
Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil*, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Adansonia Digitata (Baobab) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Seed Oil* , Olive Squalane, COCO-CAPRYLATE/CAPRATE, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil*, Hydrogenated Ethylhexyl Olivate, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Unsaponifiables, tocopherol, Calendula Officinalis Flower (Calendula) Extract*, SBoswellia Serrata (Frankincense) Oil, ANTALUM ALBUM (Sandalwood) Oil, Citrus reticulata (Mandarin) Oil, Oleum Succini (Amber Resin) Oil, Vanilla Planifolia (Vanilla) Extract *ORGANIC

1 oz

settings.heading: INGREDIENTS
settings.description:
Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Hydrogenated Ethylhexyl Olivate*, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Unsaponifiables*, Caprylic/CapricTriglyceride (Fractionated Coconut) OIL, Olive Squalane, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil, Rosa Mosqueta (Rose) Hip Seed Oil, Cannabis Sativa (Hemp) Seed Oil, Calendula Officinalis Flower (Calendula) Extract, Juniperus virginiana (Cedarwood) Oil, Chamaecyparis obtusa (Hinoki Wood) Oil, Citrus aurantium (Neroli) Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Fruit Extract, Tocopherol

*olive-derived
